content: * 2 times 1 double_crochet in each st until end of round join round with a slip_stitch in 2nd st of turning chain slip stich into the top of next st round 3 repeat round 2 fasten_off women s size only round 4 men s size only repeat round 3 fasten_off aaaaasssssssssseeeeemmmmmbbbbblllllyyyyy 4 granny squares and 2 single color squares make one slipper sew the squares together with yarn of color c according to the assembly chart then join the sides marked a together b together etc fffffiiiiinnnnniiiiissssshhhhhiiiiinnnnnggggg with hook h 5mm and color c crochet a round of single_crochet along the opening of the slipper felt the slippers in the washing machine shape when wet and let dry © m thorgren-hansson / tagasi design 2008 contact patterns@tagasi de
